title: Stay Away From That Needle
itunes:title: Stay Away From That Needle
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been trying to figure out the best way to address an issue because I love my wife dearly. My wife turned 60 in May and to celebrate, I took her to Hawaii and I gave her a $5K prepaid credit card to use any way she wanted to. When we were in Hawaii, there was a photo shoot at our hotel all weekend and young, skinny models were all over the place. My wife started to feel self-conscious in her bathing suit so I made sure I uplifted her whenever I could.....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been trying to figure out the best way to address an issue because I love my wife dearly. My wife turned 60 in May and to celebrate, I took her to Hawaii and I gave her a $5K prepaid credit card to use any way she wanted to. When we were in Hawaii, there was a photo shoot at our hotel all weekend and young, skinny models were all over the place. My wife started to feel self-conscious in her bathing suit so I made sure I uplifted her whenever I could.....................
